cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 235 mi (380 km) south of Panama City, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving northward across the eastern Gulf of Mexico toward the western Florida Panhandle
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: western Florida Panhandle (near or east of Panama City, FL)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Coast of the Florida Panhandle from the Alabama/Florida border to Navarre
weather_observation.warning_coast: Coast of the Florida Panhandle from Navarre to the Wakulla/Jefferson County line; storm-surge warning from Indian Pass to Yankeetown, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from Alabama to the Florida Big Bend
